description:
Sturdy and reliable, the Ironclad Plate provides basic 
protection for warriors entering the fray.
name: Ironclad Plate

description:
Forged with courage in mind, the Valorforge Armor 
enhances a knight's resilience on the battlefield.
name: Valorforge Armor

description:
The Guardian's Enigma Plate conceals its wearer's 
vulnerabilities with a mysterious aura.
name: Guardian's Enigma Plate

description:
Fit for royalty, the Royal Vanguard Mail offers both 
regal elegance and formidable defense for noble knights.
name: Royal Vanguard Mail

description:
Instills fear in foes with its imposing design, 
providing unparalleled protection for those who wear it.
name: Dreadnought Platemail

description:
Grants its wearer the strength and resilience of the 
legendary creature.
name: Dragonheart Cuirass

description:
The Stormforged Battleplate offers protection against 
both physical and elemental assaults.
name: Stormforged Battleplate

description:
The Sentinel's Aegis Plate ensures unwavering defense, 
shielding its wearer from harm.
name: Sentinel's Aegis Plate

description:
The Luminous Citadel Plate combines mystical 
enchantments, making it ideal for knights.
name: Luminous Citadel Plate

description:
The Celestial Guardian Plate elevates the armor to 
divine levels, offering unparalleled defense.
name: Celestial Guardian Plate

description:
The Aetherweave Robe provides both comfort and enhanced
spellcasting for mages and healers.
name: Aetherweave Robe

description:
The Celestial Veil Garb emanates a calming aura, 
perfect for those attuned to healing and celestial magic
name: Celestial Veil Garb

description:
This robe enhances a mage's connection to elemental 
forces while offering protection.
name: Mystic Ember Attire

description:
providing healers with a sense of calmness and 
heightened focus during spellcasting.
name: Serenity Shroud

description:
These ethereal robes enhance a mage's agility and 
concentration, making them ideal for intricate spellwork.
name: Ethereal Whisper Robes

description:
These vestments amplify the power of arcane spells, 
offering both style and substance for magic users.
name: Arcane Silk Vestments

description:
The Lunar Sanctum Robe grants mages and healers a 
connection to the mystique of the moon.
name: Lunar Sanctum Robe

description:
The Radiant Spirit Cloak emanates a healing aura, 
providing support during the mending of wounds.
name: Radiant Spirit Cloak

description:
This garment boosts the effectiveness of healing spells
and promotes a sense of unity among healers.
name: Healer's Harmonious Garment

description:
A blend of shadowy protection and arcane prowess, ideal
for adventurous mages.
name: Silvershadow Robes

description:
The Aegis of the Valiant provides steadfast defense 
to those who bear it.
name: Aegis of the Valiant

description:
The Ironshield Bastion serves as a bastion of defense 
for warriors on the front lines.
name: Ironshield Bastion

description:
The Stormguard Defender shields its wielder from the 
tumultuous forces of battle.
name: Stormguard Defender

description:
The Celestial Ward offers divine protection against 
both physical and magical threats.
name: Celestial Ward

description:
Embodies solidarity and resilience, ensuring the safety
of those under its protection.
name: Guardian's Shieldwall

description:
The Visage of the Iron Sentinel iIadversaries, 
offering unwavering protection to the wearer.
name: Visage of the Iron Sentinel

description:
Exudes authority, empowering the wearer with an 
imposing presence on the battlefield.
name: Warlord's Helm of Dominance

description:
The Stormforge Crown combines elegance and durability, 
offering protection against the fury of the storm.
name: Stormforge Crown

description:
The Dragonscale Helm provides both mystical resilience 
and a fearsome appearance.
name: Dragonscale Helm

description:
Grants its wearer enhanced perception under moonlit 
skies and mystical protection against magical threats.
name: Lunar Veil Helm

description:
A shimmering amulet infused with ethereal energies, 
enhancing the wearer's connection to arcane forces.
name: Aetheric Amulet

description:
A darkened torque that harnesses the power of shadows, 
providing both protection and concealment.
name: Shadowbound Torque

description:
This locket grants a sense of calm and heightened 
awareness under moonlit skies.
name: Lunar Locket of Serenity

description:
A pendant containing a captured ember from a phoenix, 
offering the wearer fiery protection and vitality.
name: Phoenix Ember Pendant

description:
An enigmatic emerald chain that conceals mysteries 
within.
name: Emerald Enigma Chain

description:
A celestial necklace adorned with stardust, channeling 
cosmic energies to enhance the wearer's abilities.
name: Stardust Scepter Necklace

description:
A collar embedded with a powerful chrono crystal, 
granting the wearer control over time-related effects.
name: Chrono Crystal Collar

description:
This medallion contains a captured soulstone, providing
the wearer with increased resilience.
name: Soulstone Medallion

description:
A choker with a celestial compass, guiding the wearer 
through magical realms and enhancing navigation.
name: Celestial Compass Choker

description:
A talisman attuned to the gentle breezes of the 
Whisperwind, granting its wearer heightened agility.
name: Whisperwind Talisman
